: : Rodimus Prime : : 
Rodimus takes the bottle away, and starts to "burp" the baby. He had seen these kind of actions done by humans when the Autobots were on Earth. 
Rodimus Prime: Well thats what it was. She was just hungry. 
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote: Elita/nightlight:

Nightlight moved and she stayed around Rodimus, Elita was sobbing 
and whinning, she was hungry. Her sobs lowed when he smelled that 
something was close... It was food!!. soon she was sucking  the 
liquid, with her little paws she massaged the bottle's side with her 
little paws in a ttempt to get more while a drop of energon slipped 
and rolled down her cheek. 

Her first sips were quick, but after a while they were slow and 
stopped to drink. Her eyes looked sleepy and... started to hiccup...
